intro: Calyptranthes rufa, commonly known as the red-leaved calyptranthes, is a small evergreen shrub native to the tropical regions of South America. Calyptranthes rufa is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its aesthetic appeal and relatively low maintenance requirements.
